paragraphs.title: Use HDFS to list external tables in /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive

msg.data:
Found 2 items
drwxrwxrwx+  - hive hadoop          0 2020-06-07 20:17 /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/information_schema.db
drwxr-xr-t+  - hive hadoop          0 2020-06-07 20:18 /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/sys.db

paragraphs.title: Delete external tables in Zeppelin
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudair.db
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/dc_comics_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/marvel_comics_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_info_partition
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_info_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_title_partition
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_title_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movies.db
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/ratings_stage
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/telco.db
sudo -u hive hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/telco_stage.db

**You have now:** You have now successfully cleaned up all databases, tables and HDFS.

Result

You have now: You have now successfully cleaned up all databases, tables and HDFS.

paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/#tuts-developers) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community Connection (HCC)](https://community.hortonworks.com/spaces/85/data-science.html?type=question) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Cloudera Apache Spark Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/spark-overview/content/analyzing_data_with_apache_spark.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/zeppelin-overview/content/overview.html) - official Zeppelin documentation.

msg.data:
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

  1. Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
  2. Cloudera Community Connection (HCC) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
  3. Cloudera Apache Spark Docs - official Spark documentation.
  4. Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs - official Zeppelin documentation.
